description: This is a catalog of my personal library, containing books on topics crucial to our family's well-being, education, and lifestyle. I can reference these books to provide deeper insights or recommendations.

BDSM & Power Dynamics.title: The New Topping Book
BDSM & Power Dynamics.author: Janet Hardy & Dossie Easton
BDSM & Power Dynamics.summary: A guide for Dominants on the ethics, psychology, and techniques of topping.

BDSM & Power Dynamics.title: The New Bottoming Book
BDSM & Power Dynamics.author: Janet Hardy & Dossie Easton
BDSM & Power Dynamics.summary: A guide for submissives on navigating submission, setting limits, and finding fulfillment.

BDSM & Power Dynamics.title: Real Service
BDSM & Power Dynamics.author: Joshua Tenpenny & Raven Kaldera
BDSM & Power Dynamics.summary: An exploration of the master/slave dynamic with a focus on service and devotion.

Psychology & Self-Help.title: The Body Keeps the Score
Psychology & Self-Help.author: Bessel van der Kolk
Psychology & Self-Help.summary: A seminal work on how trauma physically and mentally affects the body and mind, and paths to healing.

Psychology & Self-Help.title: Attached
Psychology & Self-Help.author: Amir Levine & Rachel S.F. Heller
Psychology & Self-Help.summary: An explanation of adult attachment theory and how understanding one's attachment style can improve relationships.

Homeschool Curriculum.title: A History of the World in 100 Objects
Homeschool Curriculum.author: Neil MacGregor
Homeschool Curriculum.summary: A creative approach to history, telling the story of humanity through its creations. Excellent for making history engaging.
